summary:

summary:
One of the houses I visited at work today had an absolutely stunning view of the sea.  I could have easily stayed there all day. 
When I mentioned how amazing the location was, the owner of the house replied, "Yeah, but you don't think about it after a while...
title: Lost in the Everyday

summary: Music can raise spirits… and it can save souls.  In this Big Idea for Voices Carry, author Raven Oak goes deep into the music and lyrics that carried them through the highs and lows, and on to the other side.  RAVEN OAK: Like most arts, music carries power...

summary: When an airplane crashes, impartial investigatory bodies leap into action, empowered by law to unearth what happened and why.  But there is no such empowered and impartial body to investigate CrowdStrike’s faulty update that recently unfolded, ensnarling banks, airlines, and emergency services to the tune of billions of dollars.  We need one...
title: On the Cyber Safety Review Board

summary: Every year Dragon Con, one of the largest science fiction conventions in the world, runs its own fan-centered awards, called, appropriately enough, the Dragon Awards, and this year I’m delighted to say that Starter Villain is a finalist for the award, in the category of Best Science Fiction Novel.  Here are the other finalists for […]
title: Starter Villain a Dragon Award Finalist + I’ll Be at Dragon Con
